name: Kalke
movement: 30 feet walk speed for agile navigation
description: A small fiend known for its stealthy nature and magical abilities. It has a light build with quick movements.
memorable: Its ability to sense magic and resist spells makes it a tricky foe.
goals: Typically aims to disrupt or deceive in magical settings.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other fiends or magical creatures.
environment: Found in areas of magical influence, such as enchanted forests or ruins.
strengths: Magic resistance provides significant protection against spellcasters.
weaknesses: Low Strength and Wisdom limit its effectiveness in physical confrontations.
attacks: Classic melee attack with a slam and uses magic items with potential risks.
most_powerful_ability: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
senses: Can sense magic within 120 feet, determining the direction of spells.
skills: Proficient in Sleight of Hand and Stealth, enhancing its stealthy abilities.
additional_information: Low hit points make it vulnerable despite its agility.
Can quickly escape from combat using Nimble Escape.
Uses magical items unpredictably, adding risk and reward.
Excel in stealth, making it difficult to pin down.
Bonus action allows quick Disengage or Hide from enemies.
test_queries: small fiend that uses magic items
